mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER(MEMBER_ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, ZIPCODE, GENDER) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER.nextval, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{zipcode}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, LOGIN_ID, NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.LOGIN_ID, M.NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER M
LOGIN_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} ||'%'
ORDER BY M.MEMBER_ID ASC
